items.sentence: Tell Tom what\'s going to happen to him if he does that.
Tom talked for a long time, but didn\'t really say much.
Tom became scared as soon as he saw the robber\'s knife.
Tom doesn\'t know whether what Mary says is true or not.
Tom doesn\'t like it when Mary criticizes him in public.
It\'s impossible to anticipate every possible situation.
It\'s unlikely that that movie will make a lot of money.
Mary has a crush on Tom and she wants him to notice her.
Mary is a beautiful girl with blonde hair and blue eyes.
Mary says that Tom spends his money a little too freely.
